summary: A man, Joseph, loses his wife at sea, then spirals deep into a world of confusion. The wife's brothers' need revenge! Joseph tries to tell anyone who will listen that a whale killed his ... See full summary Â»
cast: Jonathan Pryce|Monica Keena|Tippi Hedren|Ashlynn Yennie|Maurice Benard|Dominic Bogart|Ron Hale|Jaime Zevallos|Timothy Brennen|Joshua James Benard|Anthony Gaudioso|Jeremy Ford|James Gaudioso|Madeleine Hamer|Bryan McKinley|Kelley Flynn|Nina Vick|Tori Humphrey|Jeter|Amy Mordecai|Matt Schulte
title: The Ghost and The Whale
